channel.title: Why am I lagging this bad?
channel.description:
Recently I started lagging really bad when playing MineCraft. Even on SinglePlayer I lag alot :l. Is it supposed to take up this much memory and or CPU Usage?
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/rruwqc.png[/img]

item.title: Why am I lagging this bad?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:15, topic:376270”][quote author=Your Master link=topic=472202.msg3454765#msg3454765 date=1293970049]
As I said first time: Buy a Windows 8 lol.
[/quote]
God, shh, I don’t want people to realize I have a time machine. They named it “Alfred”.[/quote]
The next OS is actually rumoured to be called Windows 8 or Windows.Next though.

Read full topic
item.source: Why am I lagging this bad?

item.title: Why am I lagging this bad?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:11, topic:376270”]TNT causes memory leaks, or atleast the memory usage goes way up and it doesn’t come back down, so maybe that’s it. Change your render distance and make sure your graphics are on “Fast”, although even then it shouldn’t go to 700MB… I also read outdated drivers can take more memory (Although 700MB still seems really high, so update your graphics card drivers. If that doesn’t fix it then I’m not sure.

Actually, try playing RuneScape or something else that uses Java and see how much memory that uses. If it’s still as high then upgrade Java. Also run something else using OpenGL and compare the results.[/quote]…

Read full topic

item.title: Why am I lagging this bad?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

If you are using Vista it might be causing the issue. When I run Minecraft under Vista on my desktop it runs fine for about 2-3 minutes, and black-screens on me. Although under Win7, I do not have this issue.

Read full topic
item.source: Why am I lagging this bad?

item.title: Why am I lagging this bad?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

TNT causes memory leaks, or atleast the memory usage goes way up and it doesn’t come back down, so maybe that’s it. Change your render distance and make sure your graphics are on “Fast”, although even then it shouldn’t go to 700MB… I also read outdated drivers can take more memory (Although 700MB still seems really high, so update your graphics card drivers. If that doesn’t fix it then I’m not sure.

Actually, try playing RuneScape or something else that uses Java and see how much memory that uses. If it’s still as high then upgrade Java. Also run something else using OpenGL and compare the results.

Read full topic
item.source: Why am I lagging this bad?

item.title: Why am I lagging this bad?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Your Master:

Fix your PC. Simple: Buy a Windows 8 Vista fails.

A windows 8 LaughingMyFuckingAssOff.

Not that having Vista means anything, I’ve got Vista and it’s working alright. I do get some lag playing Runescape when my computer has been on for a while, then I just restart and everything works ok.

Read full topic
